long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color picker extension is a software tool that allows users to select and adjust colors for various purposes, such as web design, graphic design, and image editing. It typically includes a color wheel or palette, and allows users to select colors using different color models, such as RGB, HEX, and HSL. Additionally, some color picker extensions provide advanced features such as color history, the ability to save custom color swatches, and color harmony suggestions. They can be added to web browsers such as chrome, firefox and safari and also to design tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Inkscape, etc.
